definitions.text: slices of bread that have been toasted
a celebrity who receives much acclaim and attention
examples: he was the toast of the town

definitions.text: a person in desperate straits; someone doomed
examples: I'm a goner if this plan doesn't work

definitions.text: a drink in honor of or to the health of a person or event
make brown and crisp by heating

examples: Let us toast the birthday girl!
Let's drink to the New Year
